description: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?
keywords: world war two,based on true story,year 1945,u.s. military,world war two in europe
name: The Bridge at Remagen

review.name: Truth is often stranger than fiction
